title.rendered: FREE Gift Cards & Toys! + FREE Book! + Stocking Stuffers! + More!

content.rendered:
Gift Card Promotion

Don’t miss out on this deal! From November 24th through Christmas Eve, receive a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Gift cards redeemable after 12/25/2017; limit of 10 free cards. Gift cards spend like cash. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Toy Sale: Buy 3 get 1 FREE

Stock up for Christmas with this amazing toy promotion! Our Buy 3, Get 1 Free sale begins November 24th and goes through Christmas Eve. This promo includes ALL toy lines! Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Free Book Giveaway

Stop by our Macon and Warner Robins stores on December 9th and receive a FREE copy of Thomas Kinkade’s A Village Christmas when you mention this giveaway. No purchase necessary (while supplies last)! Limit one per family.

 

New Stock

“Books make great gifts because they have whole worlds inside of them.”

Shop at Gottwals today for the ultimate Christmas gift.

 

Stocking Stuffers

Christmas is right around the corner. Take advantage of our BUY 3 GET 1 FREE sale with our stocking-ready toys!

 

New John Green Book: Turtles All The Way Down

#1 bestselling author John Green returns with his first new novel since The Fault in Our Stars. We are so excited to offer signed copies to our customers!

“[Green] shows us true love – two teenagers helping and accepting each other through the most humiliating physical and emotional ordeals – and it is far more romantic than any sunset on the beach” –The New York Times Book Review

“John Green Deftly mixes the profound and the quotidian in this tough, touching valentine to the human spirit.” –The Washington Post

 

Elf on the Shelf

Keep the Elf on the Shelf tradition alive in your homes this Christmas season. Buy this brand NEW set that includes the classic picture book and your very own Elf! It’s only $19.97 (MSRP $30+).
